title: How to Draw a Bonsai Tree

steps.title: Draw a pot.
steps.content: Draw a pot. It could be a square or round, depending on your preference. Then, start with the trunk as shown.

steps.title: Add in branches.
steps.content: Add in branches. Make double lines for thickness.

steps.title: Draw ovals for basis of the leaves.
steps.content: Draw ovals for basis of the leaves.

steps.title: Add in details!
steps.content: Add in details! Scribble leaves as shown. Add rocks and grass to add a dramatic look to your tree.

steps.title: Outline your bonsai and erase guidelines.
steps.content: Outline your bonsai and erase guidelines. You can shade it lightly with pencil if you like it that way.

steps.title: Add some light green color on top of the leaves to show sun rays falling on them.
steps.content: Add some light green color on top of the leaves to show sun rays falling on them.

steps.title: Finished.
steps.content: Finished. Compare it with a real Bonsai tree and flaunt your creativity.
